mainText:
Dear Steve,

sorry for my English, but I want to write because I feel sorry for your death. The staff that you have forged says just saying that "Apple loses a mentor but above all a dear friend". All of us, Apple customers and not, lose a great person. That empty chair at the keynote was given to you, but now you look around from there.
Apple is more than just a company. Is something magical: is your inspiration. And that no one ever will remove that.

Thanks Steve for being the brilliant person who has made ​​life easier for millions of people.


A big hug.
author: Andrea
